school-house.title: Red Schoolhouse
school-house.description: Red Schoolhouses is a small (35” x 35”) quilt with sharpened pencils framing the little red schoolhouses.

hearts-ribbons.title: Hearts & Ribbons
hearts-ribbons.description: Hearts and Ribbons is a small (33” x 33”) quilt with ribbon twists around a cluster of multicolored hearts.

sweetheart-basket.title: Sweetheart Basket
sweetheart-basket.description: Quilt description here...Cupcake ipsum dolor. Sit amet macaroon candy ice cream tootsie roll donut. Oat cake sesame snaps danish. Gingerbread wafer jelly beans candy canes. Icing candy canes carrot cake jelly-o fruitcake liquorice powder candy. Chupa chups cheesecake cake cheesecake.
